Literature.Title: Lysine-homologue substitution: Impact on antimicrobial activity and proteolytic stability of cationic stapled heptapeptides
Literature.Author: Tran DVH, Luong HX, Kim DH, Lee BJ, Kim YW

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:12.5% Hemolysis=50 µM,Human erythrocytes:0.4% Hemolysis=25 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 6538P(MIC=12.5µg/ml),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 12228(MIC=6.3µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=25µg/ml),Shigella dysenteriae ATCC 9752(MIC=12.5µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium ATCC 14028(MIC=25µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 10031(MIC=37.5µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=18.8µg/ml)
